article:
American families
Most American families are small. They usually have two _ and one or two children each. Children in America will _ their parents' house when they grow up. They usually live  _ from their parents because of work. They can telephone their parents or _ with them on the Internet. And they can go to visit their parents when they are on vacation .
Parents usually let their children choose their  _  jobs. Americans think it's important for young people to  _  their future by themselves. Parents also _ their children to do some housework at home. And in many families, they pay children for  _ chores. Parents think it can help them learn  _ to make money by themselves.
